title: [BUG] Segmentation Fault  redis-server
body:
**Describe the bug**

When running `redis-server` on my M1 MacBook Pro, I got a segmentation fault as reported here:

=== REDIS BUG REPORT START: Cut & paste starting from here ===
2557:M 04 May 2021 17:52:32.561 # Redis 6.0.9 crashed by signal: 11, si_code: 2
2557:M 04 May 2021 17:52:32.561 # Crashed running the instruction at: 0x7fff20440430
2557:M 04 May 2021 17:52:32.561 # Accessing address: 0x30e293000
2557:M 04 May 2021 17:52:32.561 # Killed by PID: 0, UID: 0
2557:M 04 May 2021 17:52:32.561 # Failed assertion: <no assertion failed> (<no file>:0)

------ STACK TRACE ------
EIP:
0   libsystem_platform.dylib            0x00007fff20440430 _platform_memset$VARIANT$Rosetta + 108

Backtrace:
0   redis-server                        0x0000000104fe9bb7 logStackTrace + 110
1   redis-server                        0x0000000104fe9fd5 sigsegvHandler + 271
2   libsystem_platform.dylib            0x00007fff2043dd7d _sigtramp + 29
3   libsystem_malloc.dylib              0x00007fff202237aa tiny_free_no_lock + 1116
4   redis-server                        0x000000010503a0c3 luaD_call + 97
5   ???                                 0x0000000032aaaba2 0x0 + 850045858

------ INFO OUTPUT ------

comments_data.body:
Duplicate of #8062
please upgrade to at least 6.0.10
